snippet.title: Tides of Annihilation - Announce Trailer | PS5 Games
snippet.description:
When the streets of London are engulfed by an Outworld invasion, the only survivor, Gwendolyn, discovers a mysterious power to command the legendary Knights of the Round Table. Driven by vengeance and the desperate need to save her sister, she embarks on a high-stakes journey across two worlds: a shattered modern London and the mythical Avalon.

Unleash the power of mythical spectral knights, battle colossal foes in iconic landmarks, and uncover the truth behind the Gray Fog in this thrilling action-adventure inspired by Arthurian legend. Can you master Gwendolyn’s powers and decide the fate of two worlds?

🎮 Features Include:⚔️ Spectral Knight Dual-Fighting System – Customize devastating combos with spectral knights in frenetic high-speed battles
🏰 Modern London Meets Medieval Fantasy – Explore iconic landmarks warped by an apocalyptic Outworld invasion
🛡️ Colossal Knights Roaming the City – Scale and battle massive, dynamic knights across London in vertical, interconnected challenges
👑 30+ Unique Boss Fights – Confront demi-gods inspired by the lore of the Knights of the Round Table
🕵️ Discover the Secrets of Your Power – Unravel the mysteries of Gwendolyn’s origin in a journey of revenge, reunion, and redemption
The battle for two worlds begins. Will you rise above the Tides of Annihilation?
🔔 Subscribe for more updates and exclusive content!

Coming Soon to PS5 and PS5 PRO

#ps5 #ps5games #stateofplay #TidesOfAnnihilation

May contain content inappropriate for children. Visit http://www.esrb.org for rating information.
